page.title: 15THE NURSE'S DAY
page.content: My mother is a staff nurse at Cimla hospital.She works on Rheola ward.She works a day shift from 07:00h to 15:00h and an afternoon shift from 12:30h to 20:30h.She looks after chest patients.Their ages vary from 17 years to over 80 years.She wears a uniform. It is a blue dress,white hat,black shoes and a dark blue cape.She also has a small fob watch. She is able to measure the patients' pulse rates using her watch.She dispenses drugs and medicines and administers many injections.There is a break from 13:00h to 13:30h but my mother does her clerical work in that time.There are 30 beds for patients in her ward. 12 are for males, 12 for females and 6 are cubicles for patients who require regular injections and extra attention.My mother enjoys nursing but it is hard work. Andrew,11 years.
